text: Nam avarukku is'hakkaiyum, yahkupaiyum (cantatiyakak) kotuttarulinom, ivarkal anaivaraiyum nam nervaliyil celuttinom; itarku munnar nam nuhaiyum avarutaiya cantatiyiliruntu tavutu, sulaiman, ayyup, yusup, musa, harun akiyoraiyum nervaliyil celuttinom; ippatiye nam nanmai purivorukku narkuli valankukirom
